article:
Before October 16, 2013, I was the most  _  person in the world. I never  _  that anything bad could happen to me or my friends.
Then one day my best friend David pulled me aside and broke down in  _  . He said he was infected with AIDS and was  _  . David was only 17. I had never felt so  _  in my whole life.
As time went on, David became very ill. There was  _  we could do but watch him weaken.  _  was sure to come and quickly. There were so many things that I wanted to do and say,  _  couldn't find the words. I went to doctor after doctor with him, and saw him  go through  so much. But I must keep a positive attitude  for his good  . So, I pushed all my  _  aside and was strong for him.
Soon David was put in the  _  . This gave him the feeling that there was no more  _  left. He looked at me and said, "Faye, I am dying; let's  _  that. All I want you to do is to remember me,  _  life and be careful." For the first time in front of him, I cried.
June 5, 2014  _  the end of David's life. He went  _  . That was a comfort all in its own. In a way I was  _  that it was over, for he was no longer in pain.
It hasn't been a year yet, but I am no longer that casual teenager. I now  _  people about AIDS, and David is still with me and always will be, in mind and  _  .
